messages.message:
On UAT internal I was testing build with a mixture of passport and invoice files and the UX around suggestions is wonky
1. Clicked on an invoice but got field suggestions for passport
2. Tried to add a new class for invoice but got a suggestion for passport
3. After adding some fields, adding classes and reclassyfing I wanted to add fields to the second class and got an error `Failed to get suggested fields`

1. This is because you haven’t created any classes in this project yet, so we just use the first document in the project to suggest fields. If you create classes, we’ll use the first document of each class to suggest fields
2. I’ve seen this as well - the class suggestion may be loaded after the user starts typing. I think that we can show a better loading state if we’re still loading the class suggestion 
3. We’ll have to look into this error - can you provide this project id so that we can search the logs?
